definitions: (of an object) rotate spontaneously in a flow of moving air or water

examples.text: seeds with double-winged shapes managed to autorotate

definitions: (of the rotor blades of a helicopter) rotate without engine power during a descent

examples.text: the rotors don't need to autorotate during an emergency landing

shortDefinitions: (of rotor blades of helicopter) rotate without engine power during descent

definitions: (of the display on a mobile device) rotate when the device is turned so that the image displayed on the screen remains correctly oriented

examples.text: the screen only autorotates in tablet mode
many apps autorotate when you rotate the iPhone

shortDefinitions: (of display on mobile device) rotate when device is turned so that screen is correctly oriented
